languages.text: "Я могла бы исполнить трехночную балладу о сотворении первого камня, но вы лишены такой роскоши, как бесконечность времени. Тебе следует знать главное — камни хранят души {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g} после их смерти от ненасытной жажды Сай'лантреш. Чрез них же предки передают нам свою мудрость, а иногда даруют и силы на борьбу с врагами".

traits.locale_text: "Я могла бы исполнить трехночную балладу о сотворении первого камня, но вы лишены такой роскоши, как бесконечность времени. Тебе следует знать главное — камни хранят души {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g} после их смерти от ненасытной жажды Сай'лантреш. Чрез них же предки передают нам свою мудрость, а иногда даруют и силы на борьбу с врагами".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."
languages.original_text: "Я могла бы исполнить трехночную балладу о сотворении первого камня, но вы лишены такой роскоши, как бесконечность времени. Тебе следует знать главное — камни хранят души {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Детей Азуриана{/g} после их смерти от ненасытной жажды Сай'лантреш. Чрез них же предки передают нам свою мудрость, а иногда даруют и силы на борьбу с врагами".

They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but you do not have the luxury of eternity stretching out before you. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also let the ancestors to share their wisdom, and sometimes lend us strength to fight our enemies."

You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「最初の石の誕生について話そうと思えば三日三晩にわたるバラードになるが、なんたることか、お前には永遠の恩恵を受けるだけの余裕がない。お前が知っておくべき重要な情報は、この石は{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}が死んだ後、セランスレッシュの飽くなき飢えからその魂を守るために存在すること。また、父祖が知恵を分かち合い、時には敵と戦うための力を与えてくれることもあるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「最初の石の誕生について話そうと思えば三日三晩にわたるバラードになるが、なんたることか、お前には永遠の恩恵を受けるだけの余裕がない。お前が知っておくべき重要な情報は、この石は{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}アシュリアンの御子{/g}が死んだ後、セランスレッシュの飽くなき飢えからその魂を守るために存在すること。また、父祖が知恵を分かち合い、時には敵と戦うための力を与えてくれることもあるのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Podría entonar una balada de tres noches sobre la creación de la primera joya, pero no tienes el lujo de tener una eternidad por delante. Te contaré lo importante: las joyas protegen los espíritus de los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} de la insaciable sed de Sai'lanthresh al morir. También permiten que los antepasados compartan su sabiduría, llegando a prestarnos su fuerza contra nuestros enemigos».
languages.original_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."

traits.locale_text: «Podría entonar una balada de tres noches sobre la creación de la primera joya, pero no tienes el lujo de tener una eternidad por delante. Te contaré lo importante: las joyas protegen los espíritus de los {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}hijos de Asuryan{/g} de la insaciable sed de Sai'lanthresh al morir. También permiten que los antepasados compartan su sabiduría, llegando a prestarnos su fuerza contra nuestros enemigos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “关于第一块石头是如何被制造出来的，我可以为你唱上三天三夜的歌谣，只可惜无福消受永生的恩惠，没有这么多时间可以浪费。你只需要了解最重要的事情就行了——灵魂石会庇护{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，让他们死后免受赛·兰斯雷什无尽饥渴的滋扰。灵魂石也会帮助我们的祖先传承智慧，有时甚至会赐予我们对抗敌人的力量。”
languages.original_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."

traits.locale_text: “关于第一块石头是如何被制造出来的，我可以为你唱上三天三夜的歌谣，只可惜无福消受永生的恩惠，没有这么多时间可以浪费。你只需要了解最重要的事情就行了——灵魂石会庇护{g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}阿苏焉的子嗣{/g}，让他们死后免受赛·兰斯雷什无尽饥渴的滋扰。灵魂石也会帮助我们的祖先传承智慧，有时甚至会赐予我们对抗敌人的力量。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je pourrais vous chanter une ballade durant trois nuits pour vous relater la création de la première pierre, mais malheureusement, vous n'avez pas l'éternité devant vous. Voici donc l'essentiel : les pierres protègent les esprits des {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} décédés contre la soif insatiable de Sai'lanthresh. Elles permettent aussi à nos ancêtres de partager leur sagesse et parfois même de nous prêter main-forte lorsque nous combattons nos ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais vous chanter une ballade durant trois nuits pour vous relater la création de la première pierre, mais malheureusement, vous n'avez pas l'éternité devant vous. Voici donc l'essentiel : les pierres protègent les esprits des {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}enfants d'Asuryan{/g} décédés contre la soif insatiable de Sai'lanthresh. Elles permettent aussi à nos ancêtres de partager leur sagesse et parfois même de nous prêter main-forte lorsque nous combattons nos ennemis. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich könnte eine drei Nächte dauernde Ballade über die Schöpfung des ersten Steins darbieten, doch leider ist Euch die Gunst der Ewigkeit nicht vergönnt. Ihr solltet wissen, was wichtig ist: Die Steine schützen die Geister der {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} nach ihrem Tod vor dem unstillbaren Durst von Sai'lanthresh. Zudem ermöglichen sie den Ahnen, ihre Weisheit zu teilen und uns manchmal sogar Kraft zu schenken, um unsere Feinde zu bekämpfen."
languages.original_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte eine drei Nächte dauernde Ballade über die Schöpfung des ersten Steins darbieten, doch leider ist Euch die Gunst der Ewigkeit nicht vergönnt. Ihr solltet wissen, was wichtig ist: Die Steine schützen die Geister der {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Kinder von Asuryan{/g} nach ihrem Tod vor dem unstillbaren Durst von Sai'lanthresh. Zudem ermöglichen sie den Ahnen, ihre Weisheit zu teilen und uns manchmal sogar Kraft zu schenken, um unsere Feinde zu bekämpfen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "İlk taşın yaratılışı hakkında üç gün üç gece boyunca şarkı söyleyebilirim ancak ne yazık ki ebedî bir ömür gibi bir lüksün yok. Asıl önemli olanları söyleyeyim: Bu taşlar sayesinde {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Asuryan'ın Çocukları'nın{/g} ruhları, öldüklerinde Sai'lanthresh'in doymak bilmez açlığından korunuyor. Ayrıca bu taşlar sayesinde atalarımız; bilgeliklerini bizimle paylaşıyor, hatta bazen düşmanlarımızla savaşmamız için güç veriyor."
languages.original_text: "I could perform a three-night ballad about the creation of the first stone, but alas, you do not have the luxury of eternity's favour. You should know what is important — the stones shield the spirits of the {g|Encyclopedia:Asuryani}Children of Asuryan{/g} from the insatiable thirst of Sai'lanthresh after they die. They also enable the ancestors to share their wisdom, even sometimes lending us strength to fight our enemies."
